## Constitution check

<!-- Which principles are relevant? Verify compliance. Remove non-applicable items. -->

- [ ] **Transparency**: Behavior is explainable, no hidden side effects
- [ ] **Fail Safe**: Errors are obvious and recoverable
- [ ] **Test-First**: Tests written before implementation, coverage maintained

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass with adequate coverage (>90% core, 100% renderers)
- [ ] No secrets or credentials committed
- [ ] Breaking changes documented (if any)
